local_intent: Detect and align to the maroon square, push it left by 10 cm, then retreat and confirm no residual contact.
assumptions: Push path to the left is clear for ~10 cm.
Target is reachable and on a planar surface.
No object is held by the gripper/tool.
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer phase: DetectObject -> ApproachAndAlign -> Push(distance=0.10, direction_deg=270) -> Retreat, with final non-contact verification.
